attributes.action: to accurately answer any question asked of him - without spouting a prepared statement vaguely relating to the topic or deviating from the subject matter completely.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know I am not alone in being frustrated by politicians in  general from every party who do not answer the questions asked of them. When challenged it is normally the case that they (T.B. included) will normally say "I have answered that question" and will demand that the questioner move on. Answer the question without dodging or evading any "difficult" issue arising from it and regain the respect of the electorate!!!!!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
